price: Nítorí náà, má ṣe kánjú nípa (ìyà) wọn. A kúkú ń ka (ọjọ́) fún wọn ní kíkà tààrà.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
